description: Unique identifier for the work plan associated with this ACP entry; used for linking schedules and budgets.
Plan year index within a multiâ€‘year plan (e.g., 1 for first year); confirm with SME.
Percentage of budget or effort allocated to labor for the plan; confirm with SME.
Percentage of the plan allocated to materials; confirm with SME.
Percentage allocated to system/overhead or other indirect costs; confirm with SME.
Expected working hours per day, possibly as a percentage of standard hours; confirm with SME.
Primary identifier for the ACP plan record used to link related details; confirm with SME.
Report template or form identifier used when printing the plan.
Prefix characters applied when generating plan or document numbers; confirm with SME.
System setting indicating the default column used for display or sorting in forms; confirm with SME.
Default activity or layout used when printing plan activities; confirm with SME.
User or process that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification.
User or process that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
